    Astro Forms

    An approachable iOS forms framework for building beautiful, reusable and easy to maintain forms.

    Documentation →

    Lightweight

    Build forms by composing protocols to keep things simple and lightweight - each form and row include just the features they need.

    Validation, theming, keyboard focus

    Astro Forms focuses on painful parts of form managment, So you can focus on building fantastic UIViews.

    Type-Safe to extend and use

    No magic strings for row access or data retrieval required - build with Swift's type system end to end and ship less code with confidence.

    # Getting Started

    Want to dive right in?

    pod install 'AstroForms'
